source_info.purpose: We provides one year course “Diploma in Computer Applications, Business Accounting and Multilingual DTP (CABA-MDTP)” has been designed for transformation of Urdu .We also  provides legal awareness/counselling/aid to victims of domestic violence/abuse, and their rehabilitation through vocational training in Computer Application, Beauty Culture and Cutting
